meanings.sent1: The patient was symptomless after the treatment.
meanings.sent2: She felt perfectly fine, symptomless and healthy.
meanings.sent3: The symptomless cat fooled everyone into thinking it was sick.
meanings.sent4: The calm lake was a symptomless mirror of the sky above.
meanings.sent5: The symptomless garden was a peaceful oasis of greenery.

meanings.sent1: The symptomless child surprised the doctor with their good health.
meanings.sent2: He appeared symptomless, but the virus was still present.
meanings.sent3: The symptomless party guest danced all night without a care.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a symptomless mask hiding her true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The symptomless tree stood tall and strong in the forest.
